Summarizes the intensities within hierarchy

Source: R/tidyMS_aggregation.R
aggregate_intensity.Rd

Summarizes the intensities within hierarchy

aggregate_intensity(data, config, .func)

Arguments

func

- a function working on a matrix of intensities for each protein.

Value

returns list with data (data.frame) and config (AnalysisConfiguration)

See also

Other aggregation: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, aggregateTopNIntensities(), intensity_summary_by_hkeys(), medpolishPlydf_config(), medpolishPlydf(), medpolishPly(), medpolish_protein_quants(), plot_aggregation(), plot_hierarchies_add_quantline(), plot_hierarchies_line_df(), plot_hierarchies_line(), summarizeRobust_config(), summarizeRobust()

Examples


library( prolfqua )
library(tidyverse)
dd <- prolfqua::ionstar$filtered()

#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
config <- dd$config
data <- dd$data

data <- prolfqua::transform_work_intensity(data, config, log2)

#> Warning: `funs()` was deprecated in dplyr 0.8.0.
#> Please use a list of either functions or lambdas: 
#> 
#>   # Simple named list: 
#>   list(mean = mean, median = median)
#> 
#>   # Auto named with `tibble::lst()`: 
#>   tibble::lst(mean, median)
#> 
#>   # Using lambdas
#>   list(~ mean(., trim = .2), ~ median(., na.rm = TRUE))
#> Column added : log2_peptide.intensity
colnames(data)

#>  [1] "protein_Id"                  "raw.file"                   
#>  [3] "sampleName"                  "dilution."                  
#>  [5] "run_Id"                      "isotope"                    
#>  [7] "peptide_Id"                  "peptide.intensity"          
#>  [9] "pep"                         "nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id"
#> [11] "log2_peptide.intensity"     
bbMed <- aggregate_intensity(data, config, .func = medpolishPlydf_config)

#> starting aggregation
#> Warning: medpolish() did not converge in 10 iterations
#> Warning: medpolish() did not converge in 10 iterations

bbRob <- aggregate_intensity(data, config, .func = summarizeRobust_config)

#> starting aggregation
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
#> Warning: 'rlm' failed to converge in 20 steps
names(bbMed$data)

#> [1] "protein_Id" "sampleName" "dilution."  "run_Id"     "raw.file"  
#> [6] "isotope"    "medpolish" 
names(bbRob$data)

#> [1] "protein_Id"                  "sampleName"                 
#> [3] "dilution."                   "run_Id"                     
#> [5] "raw.file"                    "isotope"                    
#> [7] "mean.log2_peptide.intensity" "weights"                    
#> [9] "lmrob"                      
length(bbMed$data$medpolish)

#> [1] 3260
length(bbRob$data$lmrob)

#> [1] 3260
plot(bbMed$data$medpolish, bbRob$data$lmrob, log="xy", pch=".")

abline(0,1, col=2)

plot(bbMed$data$medpolish[1:100], bbRob$data$lmrob[1:100])

abline(0,1)
